title: Nirvana-In_Utero_(20th_Anniversary_Super_Deluxe)_[Mastered_for_i

Description: To say that NirvanaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s third and ultimately final studio album In Utero was 1993's most polarizing record would be the understatement of a decade. The unadorned sonic rawness of Steve AlbiniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s recording laid bare every primal nuance of the most confrontational yet vulnerable material Kurt Cobain, Krist Novoselic and Dave Grohl would ever record. And with its 1991 predecessor Nevermind having sold some 30 million copies, singlehandedly returning honest rock Ã¢â‚¬ËœnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ roll to the top of the pop charts, In Utero was essentially the first record Nirvana would make with any expectations from the public.
This 20th Anniversary 2CD Deluxe Edition of the unwitting swansong of the single most influential band of the 1990s features the original album remastered at Abbey Road Studios plus a veritable treasure trove of never-before-heard demos, mixes, B-sides and bonus tracks from the original album release.
